list.name: Changes
list.comment:
A test case for writing a JSON parser.
We read a certain JSON file using Python tools and check for errors, and if necessary, we edit the source file.
The file for the developer is as important as the list of software installed on the computer for the development of all kinds of applications.
At the same time, this file will serve to train the skills of handling JSON files from Python programs.
This development was carried out in the PyCharm environment. It turned out that this environment (IDE) is most suitable for developing both simple and complex programs. Of course, I don't recommend giving up on Anaconda-Spyder, or IDLE-python3.x, or Notepad at all.
It remains to comment on the operation of the program. Everything is simple here: after running in the console, everything will be printed out. Both the commentary and the results of the work.
Optional: In the folder with the program, you need to create a folder docs. There will be a JSON source, as well as the results of the program.
